messages.subject: portfolios for unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: Hi All, does anyone have any resources for portfolio creators? My daughter would like the option of going to college and we would like some help in creating a
messages.messageBody:
Hi All,
does anyone have any resources for portfolio creators? My daughter would like the option of going to college and we would like some help in creating a great portfolio for that. As I am not much of a record keeper (for me it interferes with joyful unschooling), I would like someone to be able to turn her life experiences into some sort of cohesiveness. We have communicated some with www.tlci.org but they really focus on a diploma and use the Carnegie credit system, and that is pretty unimportant to us.
Any ideas?
Elissa
"No matter who or what made you what you have become, that doesn't release you from the
responsibility of making yourself over into what you ought to be." ~Ashley Montagu
http://www.myspace.com/elissajillcleaveland

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
